titleStmt.title: Reasons monarchie. Set forth by Robert Mason of Lincolnes Inne Gent
titleStmt.author: Mason, Robert, 1571-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims, dwelling on Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne,

notesStmt.note: The two final leaves contain a poem, "The minds priuiledge".
Some print faded, some pages stained, and some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library .

place.placeName: Adling hill at the signe of the white Swanne
